data.title: UWG Wolves | Athletic Programs | Official Athletics Site
data.meta_description:
Mike Miller (13) Safety  - 2021
Played in all 12 games for the Wolves... had 44 tackles on the season, 29 of them being solo... recovered 2 fumbles on the season
data.meta_site_name: UWG Wolves | Athletic Programs | Official Athletics Site
data.text:
2021

Played in all 12 games for the Wolves... had 44 tackles on the season, 29 of them being solo... recovered 2 fumbles on the season returning them both for touchdowns... had one pass break up...

2020

No Season (COVID-19)

2019

played in 11 games... racked up 17 tackles, 1 TFL, 2 FR, 2 INTs... caught an interception and recovered a fumble against Shorter on October 5, 2019.

2018

Led Catawba in total tackles with 99, and recorded 6 tackles for loss and 2 interceptions...

2017

Had a stellar freshman campaign in Catawba tallying 30 total tackles, 2 tackles for loss, 1 sack, and 1 interception...

Overview

A lengthy and physical safety joining the Wolves for his senior season...attended Arabia Mountain High School in Lithonia, GA... was a stellar player on both sides of the ball in the Ram's 10-3 season in 2016... spent the previous two season playing for Catawba...
